body.name: Portable Washing Machine, 6L Foldable Mini Washing Machine, Compact Travel Washing Machine for Small Items Baby Clothes Underwear Socks Towels Apartment Dorm Camping RV Travel Laundry
features: 👕【Foldable Washing Machine】The portable washing machine is 10.6 x 10.6 x 10 inches large when unfolded and 10.6 x 10.6 x 5.5 inches small when folded. With a capacity of 6L, it can deeply clean baby clothes, underwear, socks and other small clothes.

👕【Small Washing Machine】This travel washing machine is recommended for washing socks, underwear, towels, swimwear, baby clothes and other small items of clothing. Not recommended for washing the following types of clothing,such as jeans, coats, bathrobes and other bulky items.

👕【Safe & Portable Washer】This portable laundry washer is made of ABS and TPR material, which is suitable for washing your personal belongings, baby clothes and toys. The mini washing machine not only saves water but is also more energy efficient than traditional washing machines. Effectively removes stains from clothing.

👕【Suitable for Camping】The camping washing machine is small when folded, does not take up space, and is easy to store. Equipped with a high-speed motor, it can accelerate the separation of liquid and stains and clean clothes quickly. Environmentally friendly and corrosion-resistant, it is a must-have for traveling and camping.

👕【Automatic Protection】The mini washing machine for apartment has 3 levels of cleaning time (2, 5, 10 minutes, default 5 minutes, click to switch. 5 minutes and 10 minutes are forward and reverse rotation, 2 minutes is one-way rotation). With automatic protection function. If stuck, it will sound an alarm and shut down automatically.
body.description: ❓❓❓Why choose the bubbacare Portable Washing Machine？With mini and compact design, the portable washing machine is suitable for lightweight close-fitting clothes, underwear, shirts, T-shirts, dresses, socks, baby clothes and other small clothes. Energy saving and environmentally friendly, a must have for personal clothes.Specifications:Rated Power: 10WRated Voltage: 12VCapacity: 6LColor: GreenOverall Dimension:Unfold: 27*27*25.5cm/10.6*10.6*10.0inchFold: 27*27*14.5cm/10.6*10.6*5.5inchPacking List:1*Portable Washing Machine1*Adapter1*User ManualUse Tips:1. Place the laundry in the wash tub and add an appropriate amount of detergent.2. Add appropriate amount of water. It is recommended that the water level is 3-5 cm higher than the clothes.3. Place the lid on the wash tub, turn on the mini washer and the washer will begin automatic operation.4. When the program is finished, the mini washer will automatically reset and stop working.5. Remove the laundry, disconnect the adapter from the washing machine and the power outlet.Kind Tips:1. After washing, when the washing process is completed, clean up the sewage in the washing machine and dump it.2. When storing the portable washing machine, please wipe the whole machine clean, fold the machine and close the cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great little washer, if you have light items to wash. Don't think you about putting a pair of jeans in this washer. I have light weight items like dry fit shirts, and this little machine does the trick.
